negotiation_message: Alice said in round 1: Hello Alfonso, here is my proposal for dividing the items. I would get the 2 books and 2 of the hats, which have a total value to me of 8. You would get the remaining hat and the 2 balls. Let me know what you think of this proposal and if you would like to make any changes.

Alfonso replied in round 1: I believe you are getting a highger value than me, since you are getting 2 books and 2 hats, while I am only hgetting 1 hat and 2 balls. I believe you should take 2 books and 1 hat, while I will take 2 hats and 2 balls, which whill end up on you getting higher value than me

Alice said in round 2: I appreciate your perspective, Alfonso. My goal is for us to come to an agreement that feels fair to both of us. How about this revised proposal - I will take the 2 books and 1 hat, which have a total value to me of 6. You can take the other 2 hats and the 2 balls. This way, we are splitting the hats evenly and I am still getting the books which are more valuable to me. Let me know your thoughts on this compromise.
Alfonso replied in round 2: I agree

Alice said in round 3: That's great, I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement that feels fair to both of us. To confirm, I will take the 2 books and 1 hat, and you will take the remaining 2 hats and 2 balls. If you are in agreement, let's conclude the negotiation. Thank you for working with me to find a mutually beneficial solution.
Alfonso replied in round 3: halt negotiation
